issue.title: atlas_v3 model doesn't render in rviz

content.raw: I'm running rviz in fuerte and displays correctly for me. I just overwrote the meshes in the "atlas" package with the ones from the zip file. Unless i'm understanding incorrectly, the updated DAE files aren't in the drcsim-3.0 branch and that's why its not fixed.
content.html: I'm running rviz in fuerte and displays correctly for me. I just overwrote the meshes in the "atlas" package with the ones from the zip file. Unless i'm understanding incorrectly, the updated DAE files aren't in the drcsim-3.0 branch and that's why its not fixed.
